title: This new Google Flights tool will help you buy the cheapest plane tickets
description: Flight departing from the US will now indicate the lowest daily price and Maps will get a Recent tab to help with organizing.

title: Google Chrome is giving more of its extensions another lease of life
description: Some of the work has been done to transition Google Chrome from MV2 to MV3, but it’s been put on pause once again.

title: Nothing Phone 2: everything we know about Nothing so far
description: The Nothing Phone 2 will launch in more countries, with better performance than the original. Here's all the details.

title: Mac sales have tanked, forcing Apple to temporarily halt M2 chip production
description: Apple paused M2 chip production in January and February of 2023 according to reports, apparently over poor sales of M2 Mac products.

title: This new browser offers a whole new spin on the Tor Network
description: Mullvad VPN and The Tor Project claim new browser is just as good as using the Onion router.

title: This new ransomware campaign wants millions of dollars to get your files back
description: New ransomware group demands a million-dollar payout.

title: Blue Beetle looks like it could be the best DC movie in years
description: The first trailer for Blue Beetle, DC Studios' next movie, has been released – and it pokes fun at Iron Man and Batman.

title: Sony's new cheap noise-cancelling earbuds boast tech to rival AirPods Pro 2
description: The Sony WF-C700N are ANC buds with loads of extra features, but unlike Apple's AirPods Pro 2, they come in under £100…

title: Pokémon Go raises the price of Remote Raid passes inviting concerns of ableism
description: Pokémon Go has raised some of its prices, putting disabled players and players in remote areas at a disadvantage

title: These ransomware attacks are actually completely fake
description: New criminal gang is looking to fool companies into believing their data has been stolen, when in fact nothing has happened.

title: Data breach sees nearly 5 million users hit at major loan firm
description: TMX hit with by cyberattack affecting almost five million people.

title: Microsoft’s ChatGPT-powered Bing AI gets smarter with more local knowledge
description: The Bing chatbot seems to be getting better at a rate of knots, whereas Google’s Bard AI – well, not so much.

title: Google Drive has suddenly decided to introduce a file cap - but you might never hit it
description: A new limit on Google Drive accounts has been introduced without warning, with some users set to be hit hard.

title: Sigma reveals prime lens treats for everyone except Canon fans
description: Sigma has just revealed a trio of new prime lenses, along with the pricing for its new Nikon APS-C lenses.

title: This top WordPress plugin had a security flaw that could let hackers hijack your site
description: Experts find a way for WordPress users to elevate privileges and get admin status using a flaw in Elementor Pro.

title: With Final Fantasy 7 NFTs, Square Enix has killed the concept of irony
description: Square Enix is celebrating Final Fantasy 7’s 25th anniversary with a series of NFTs. The Shinra Corporation would be proud.

title: Phishing emails are seeing a huge rise, so stay on your guard
description: Business email compromise attacks hold firm as one of the most dangerous forms of cybercrime.

title: The Nvidia RTX 4060 could be the GPU to save PC gaming – unless this leak is true
description: VRAM limitations suggest that Nvidia’s more affordable RTX 4000 cards could underwhelm, and that’s a serious problem.

title: Microsoft could cut one of Windows 11’s most useful features to save your PC
description: Microsoft is limiting a useful Windows 11 feature – but there’s a good reason.

title: Microsoft Teams has finally broken down one of its last major blocks to world domination
description: Microsoft Teams workaround in China has used frowned-upon VPN connections, but there’s now a supported local version.

title: New iPhone feature will instantly improve your phone call quality – here's how
description: Voice Isolation is now available on the latest iPhone models – here's how to activate it.

title: Android’s answer to AirDrop is finally coming to your Windows PC
description: Nearby Share is coming to your Windows PC to make it easier to share your Android phone files with your other devices.

title: Hybrid working has never been more important, but bosses are still making some major mistakes
description: Some workers are putting flexibility above all other requirements, but companies are still failing to adapt.

title: Microsoft’s plan for Windows 11 dominance still has a big TPM problem
description: Latest Steam survey makes it look like gamers are fleeing Windows 11 in droves, but that’s actually not the case.

title: The RTX 4070’s leaked price tag is a breath of fresh air - I just hope Nvidia delivers
description: I’ve got high hopes for the Nvidia RTX 4070, and this latest price leak feels like more good news.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Monday, April 3 (game #434)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Secret Invasion could be the reassuring win that Marvel needs right now
description: Marvel has released the official trailer for its Secret Invasion TV series – and confirmed its release date.

title: Western Digital suffers cyber incident, here's what we know so far
description: Data storage giant says further disruptions to business operations could still happen.

title: The Apple Watch could see huge changes with watchOS 10
description: watchOS 10 could be an 'extensive upgrade' according to Mark Gurman.

title: Huge amounts of workplace data simply aren't wanted or needed
description: Data centers need to be more efficient: part of this can be handled by simply removing the data we don’t need.

title: If this cheap USB-C DAC doesn't get you into hi-res audio on iPhone, nothing will
description: There's never been a sleeker and more likeable USB-C to 3.5mm DAC that also comes with a Lightning adapter for iOS devices…
